document_data.name: Whispering Witch
document_data.mainbody: The '''Whispering Witch''' was a dark yet cozy [[inn]] located in [[Tilverton]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The Witch was in the [[Tilverton/Old Town|Old Town]] of Tilverton at the end of [[Haddock Row]], off the [[Street of the Sorceress]] not far from the [[Market Stairs]].
document_data.Activities: The inn was named for the unexplained sounds and [[spell]]s that were often heard behind its closed doors.
document_data.Inhabitants: The Witch was owned and operated by two sisters – the [[mage]]s [[Aluana Nithrin|Aluana]] and [[Jhansabella Nithrin]]. Both of the sisters, as well as the [[Alstigar|cook]] and [[Kheldrar Ghaudelar|stablemaster]] were secret agents of the [[Harpers]].
